name: Sandcastle Scuffle!
description:
Remember when you were little and built sandcastles on the beach? Relive that feeling again! But with guns! And mobs and other Players to shoot at! And the castle is gigantic or you're really small!

... So not at all like you remember it. But you'll probably like this better!

A player-made game by Adventure Box maker C.H

To player, make and share your own online games, visit https://www.adventurebox.com
